text: Woh Allah hi hai jo tumko khushki (land) aur tari (sea) mein chalata hai. Chunanche jab tum kashtiyon mein sawar hokar baad-e-mawafiq par farhan-o-shadan safar kar rahey hotey ho aur phir yakayak baad-e-mukhalif ka zoar hota hai (fierce gale appears) aur har taraf se maujon (waves) ke thapede lagte hain aur musafir samajh lete hain ke toofan mein ghir gaye, us waqt sab apne deen ko Allah hi ke liye khalis karke ussey duaein maangte hain ke “agar tu nay humko is bala se najat de di to hum shukar guzar banday banenge”
